Amazing Grace.lyrics:
G Amazing grace, how sweet the sound
C That saved a wretch like G me
G I once was lost, but now am found
D Was blind, but G now I see

G 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear
C And grace my fears relieved
G How precious did that grace appear
D The hour I G first believed

G Through many dangers, toils, and snares
C I have already come
G 'Tis grace that brought me safe thus far
D And grace will G lead me home

G When we've been there ten thousand years
C Bright shining as the sun
G We've no less days to sing God's praise
D Than when we G first begun.

Silent Night.lyrics:
C Silent night, holy night
G7 All is calm, C all is bright
F Round yon virgin C mother and child
F Holy infant so C tender and mild
G7 Sleep in heavenly C peace
C/G Sleep in G7 heavenly C peace.

Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas.lyrics:
C Have yourself a merry little Christmas
G7 Let your heart be light
C From now on, our troubles will be out of sight

F Have yourself a merry little Christmas
C Make the Yuletide gay
Dm From now on, our troubles will be miles away
G7 Here we are as in olden days
C Happy golden days of yore
F Faithful friends who are dear to us
C Gather near to us once more

C Through the years we all will be together
G7 If the fates allow
C Hang a shining star upon the highest bough
F And have yourself a merry little Christmas now.

I Surrender All.lyrics:
C All to Jesus I surrender
G/B All to Him I freely give
C I will ever love and trust Him
F In His presence daily live

C I surrender all
G I surrender all
F All to Thee my blessed Savior
C I surrender all

C All to Jesus I surrender
G/B Humbly at His feet I bow
C Worldly pleasures all forsaken
F Take me, Jesus, take me now

C I surrender all
G I surrender all
F All to Thee my blessed Savior
C I surrender all

C All to Jesus I surrender
G/B Make me, Savior, wholly Thine
C Let me feel the Holy Spirit
F Truly know that Thou art mine

C I surrender all
G I surrender all
F All to Thee my blessed Savior
C I surrender all

The First Noel.lyrics:
C The first Noel, the angels did say
G Was to certain poor shepherds in fields as they lay
C In fields where they lay keeping their sheep
F On a cold winter's night that was so deep

C Noel, Noel, Noel, Noel
G Born is the King of Israel

C They looked up and saw a star
G Shining in the east, beyond them far
C And to the earth it gave great light
F And so it continued both day and night

C Noel, Noel, Noel, Noel
G Born is the King of Israel

C And by the light of that same star
G Three wise men came from country far
C To seek for a king was their intent
F And to follow the star wherever it went

C Noel, Noel, Noel, Noel
G Born is the King of Israel

C This star drew nigh to the northwest
G O'er Bethlehem it took its rest
C And there it did both stop and stay
F Right over the place where Jesus lay

C Noel, Noel, Noel, Noel
G Born is the King of Israel

Hark the Herald Angels Sing.lyrics:
C Hark! the herald angels sing
G Glory to the newborn King
C Peace on earth and mercy mild
G God and sinners reconciled

F Joyful, all ye nations rise
C Join the triumph of the skies
Am With angelic host proclaim
D7 Christ is born in Bethlehem

G Hark! the herald angels sing
C Glory to the newborn King

C Christ, by highest heaven adored
G Christ, the everlasting Lord
C Late in time behold him come
G Offspring of the virgin’s womb

F Veiled in flesh, the Godhead see
C Hail the incarnate Deity
Am Pleased, as man, with men to dwell
D7 Jesus, our Emmanuel

G Hark! the herald angels sing
C Glory to the newborn King

C Hail! the heaven-born Prince of Peace
G Hail the Son of Righteousness
C Light and life to all he brings
G Risen with healing in his wings

F Mild he lays his glory by
C Born that man no more may die
Am Born to raise the sons of earth
D7 Born to give them second birth

G Hark! the herald angels sing
C Glory to the newborn King

O Holy Night.lyrics:
C O holy night, the stars are brightly shining
F It is the night of our dear Savior’s birth
C Long lay the world in sin and error pining
G7 Till He appeared and the soul felt its worth

C A thrill of hope, the weary world rejoices
F For yonder breaks a new and glorious morn

Am Fall on your knees
Em O hear the angel voices
F O night divine
C O night when Christ was born
F O night divine
C O night
G7 O night divine

O Come All Ye Faithful.lyrics:
C O come, all ye faithful
G Joyful and triumphant
C O come ye, O come ye to G Bethlehem
C Come and behold Him
F Born the King of angels

C O come, let us adore Him
G O come, let us adore Him
C O come, let us adore Him
G Christ the C Lord

C Sing, choirs of angels
G Sing in exultation
C O sing, all ye citizens of G heaven above
C Glory to God
F Glory in the highest

C O come, let us adore Him
G O come, let us adore Him
C O come, let us adore Him
G Christ the C Lord

C Yea, Lord, we greet Thee
G Born this happy morning
C Jesus, to Thee be all G glory given
C Word of the Father
F Now in flesh appearing

C O come, let us adore Him
G O come, let us adore Him
C O come, let us adore Him
G Christ the C Lord.

Jingle Bell Rock.lyrics:
C Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock
F Jingle bells swing and jingle bells ring
C Snowin' and blowin' up bushels of fun
G7 Now the jingle hop has begun

C Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock
F Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
C Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
G7 In the frosty air

C What a bright time, it's the right time
F To rock the night away
C Jingle bell time is a swell time
G7 To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh

C Giddy-up jingle horse, pick up your feet
F Jingle around the clock
C Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' beat
G7 That's the jingle bell rock.
